original_text: When Absalom's servants came to the woman at the house, they said, “Where are Ahimaaz and Jonathan?” And the woman said to them, “They have gone over the brook of water.” And when they had sought and could not find them, they returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 압살롬의 종들이 그 집에 와서 여인에게 묻되 아히마아스와 요나단이 어디 있느냐 하니 여인이 그들에게 이르되 그들이 시내를 건너가더라 하니 그들이 찾아도 만나지 못하고 예루살렘으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: When Absalom's servants came to the woman at the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 압살롬의 신하들이 그 집의 여인에게 왔을 때,

sentences.original_text: And the woman said to them,
“They have gone over the brook of water.”
And when they had sought and could not find them,
